ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Designating Regulatory Provisions for Purposes of Enforcement (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS DESIGNATING REGULATORY PROVISIONS FOR PURPOSES OF ENFORCEMENT (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to reflect the repeal of the Chlor-Alkali Mercury Release Regulations.
